page.title: 09PORTHCAWL-Recreation Areas
page.content: Being a tourist area there are many recreation and leisure persuits to be found in Porthcawl,during the summer and winter months,both for adults and children.The features of the coastline provides ample recreation itself. The Amusement Park opens from April to October and provides entertainment for local and visiting families.There are numerous hotels and clubs open all the year round.One of the focal points of enterainment is the Grand Pavilion, situated on the sea front.It provides a great variety of shows and concerts during the summer and winter-the annual Christmas Panto.draws large crowds from all over S.Wales.There are also other activities in town:the History Soc;Little Theatre;Male Voice Choir;Golf;Cricket;Rugby;Soccer;Bowls Clubs to mention a few.
